get.summary: JSON Schema definition for the Logical Model StructureDefinition-IMMZ_D21_Generate_verifiable_digital_certificate
get.description: This endpoint serves the JSON Schema definition for the Logical Model StructureDefinition-IMMZ_D21_Generate_verifiable_digital_certificate.

StructureDefinition-IMMZ_D21_Generate_ve.title: IMMZ.D21.Generate verifiable digital certificate
StructureDefinition-IMMZ_D21_Generate_ve.description: Data elements for the IMMZ.D21.Generate verifiable digital certificate Data Dictionary Activity.

resourceType.description: Resource type identifier for IMMZ_D21_Generate_verifiable_digital_certificate logical model

IMMZD21.description: Data elements for the IMMZ.D21.Generate verifiable digital certificate Data Dictionary Activity.

certificateIssuer.description: The authority or authorized organization that issued the vaccination certificate

healthCertificateIdentifier.description: Unique identifier used to associate the immunization event represented in a paper vaccination card to its digital representation(s)

certificateValidFrom.description: Date in which the certificate for an immunization event became valid.  No health or clinical inferences should be made from this date

certificateValidUntil.description: Last date in which the certificate for an immunization event is valid. No health or clinical inferences should be made from this date

certificateSchemaVersion.description: Version of the core data set and HL7 Fast Health Interoperability Resources (FHIR) implementation guide that the certificate is using
